scenario_1.title: Scenario 2: Gaia's Encounter with a Hostile Faction
scenario_1.body: While Gaia is still reeling from her awakening, she unknowingly stumbles upon a hidden camp belonging to a powerful faction that seeks to suppress any knowledge of the plant's healing properties. Gaia's heightened senses allow her to sense danger, and she narrowly escapes capture. Fueled by a newfound determination, she realizes that she must gather allies and form an underground movement to protect the plant's knowledge from those who would exploit it for their own gain.

scenario_2.title: The Betrayal
scenario_2.body: While evading capture, Gaia encounters a charismatic individual who claims to be sympathetic to her cause. This person offers to guide her to a safe haven where like-minded individuals gather. However, as they journey together, Gaia begins to suspect that this person may have ulterior motives. Eventually, her suspicions are confirmed when they lead her straight into a trap set by the hostile faction. Gaia must rely on her wits and newfound abilities to escape and continue her mission.
